ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event.

ivardefs.name: bodySite
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the site on the subject's body where the observation was made (i.e. the target site).

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: A code that classifies the general type of observation being made.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Describes what was observed. Sometimes this is called the observation "name".

ivardefs.name: comment
ivardefs.desc: May include statements about significant, unexpected or unreliable values, or information about the source of the value where this may be relevant to the interpretation of the result.

ivardefs.name: component_
ivardefs.desc: Some observations have multiple component observations.  These component observations are expressed as separate code value pairs that share the same attributes.  Examples include systolic and diastolic component observations for blood pressure measurement

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: The healthcare event  (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this observation is made.

ivardefs.name: dataAbsentReason
ivardefs.desc: Provides a reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] is missing.

ivardefs.name: device
ivardefs.desc: The device used to generate the observation data.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this observation.

ivardefs.name: interpretation
ivardefs.desc: The assessment made based on the result of the observation.  Intended as a simple compact code often placed adjacent to the result value in reports and flow sheets to signal the meaning/normalcy status of the result. Otherwise known as abnormal flag.

ivardefs.name: issued
ivardefs.desc: The date and time this observation was made available to providers, typically after the results have been reviewed and verified.

ivardefs.name: method
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the mechanism used to perform the observation.

ivardefs.name: performer_
ivardefs.desc: Who was responsible for asserting the observed value as "true".

ivardefs.name: referenceRange_
ivardefs.desc: Guidance on how to interpret the value by comparison to a normal or recommended range.

ivardefs.name: related_
ivardefs.desc: A  reference to another resource (usually another Observation) whose relationship is defined by the relationship type code.

ivardefs.name: specimen
ivardefs.desc: The specimen that was used when this observation was made.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the result value.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient, or group of patients, location, or device whose characteristics (direct or indirect) are described by the observation and into whose record the observation is placed.  Comments: Indirect characteristics may be those of a specimen, fetus, dono
